definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
lit. to decorate the front of one's store (idiom)/fig. to embellish (one's CV, etc)/to keep up appearances/to put up a front

sentences.english: The stars blazoned on that wall.
sentences.chinese: 星星的紋章裝點了那面牆。

sentences.english: Perform a filesystem check on the disk that contains the? bad mount point.
sentences.chinese: 對包含壞安裝點的磁盤進行文件系統檢查。

sentences.english: Wildflowers of different colors brighten the rocky land.
sentences.chinese: 多彩的野花裝點了這個多石的地方。

sentences.english: Tithonus once, the tale was, rose-armed Dawn.
sentences.chinese: 提託諾斯據說曾經是玫瑰裝點的黎明。

sentences.english: Han Taiwanese as well as indigenous filmgoers don aboriginal dress for the viewing.
sentences.chinese: 爲了裝點風景臺灣漢族影迷們也穿上土著居民的服飾。

sentences.english: For two years I have been able to pick these beautiful flowers to decorate the table.
sentences.chinese: 兩年來，我一直用這些美麗的花朵來裝點餐桌。

sentences.english: Smith flew to Beijing, expecting to furnish and decorate tropical villas.
sentences.chinese: 接下來史密斯飛到北京，打算裝點一座熱帶別墅。

sentences.english: Still you will find people who love to adorn themselves with beautifully knitted cardigans.
sentences.chinese: 不過你會發現人們誰愛來裝點自己的美麗的針織外套。

sentences.english: Lots of dead insects lie on the windowsill.
sentences.chinese: 各種各樣的昆蟲屍體裝點着窗臺。
雪片裝點得樹木銀光燦燦。

sentences.english: The Resting Area for Guests are redecorated in a festival atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 來賓休息區裝點一新，撲面而來的喜悅氛圍。

sentences.english: The flag adds a dash of colour to the grey building.
sentences.chinese: 那面旗子裝點著灰禿禿的大樓。

sentences.english: Clusters of colorful flowers make the city more beautiful than ever.
sentences.chinese: 一簇簇鮮花把城市裝點得比以往任何時候都美麗。

sentences.english: Bring out the cookie cutters, sprinkles, frostings, and cook, then decorate your cookies.
sentences.chinese: 拿出曲奇刀，噴水壺，糖霜就開始裝點你的曲奇吧。

sentences.english: The butterfly adornment that paillette comprises does not provide craftsmanship, ankle of deck sex appeal.
sentences.chinese: 亮片組成的蝴蝶裝飾別具匠心，裝點性感腳踝。

sentences.english: The public buildings were festooned for the holiday.
sentences.chinese: 這座公共建築物爲迎接節日裝點成花彩形。
